recipe.name: Garlic Bread Mini Pizzas (Muffin Tin)
recipe.description: These mini pizzas are made using bread! Brushed with garlic butter so this really does taste like a cross between garlic bread and pizza. The filling options are endless - use your favourite pizza toppings.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup grated cheese (, melting (I used a mix of mozzarella and tasty, equal amounts))

recipeInstructions.text: Use a large empty can (800g/28oz canned tomato can) to cut out rounds from the bread. (Note 4)
recipeInstructions.name: Use a large empty can (800g/28oz canned tomato can) to cut out rounds from the bread. (Note 4)

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter, garlic and salt in a microwave-proof bowl or mug and microwave in 30 second increments until the butter is melted.
recipeInstructions.name: Place butter, garlic and salt in a microwave-proof bowl or mug and microwave in 30 second increments until the butter is melted.

recipeInstructions.text: Brush cups with butter, ensuring you use the garlic too.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush cups with butter, ensuring you use the garlic too.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the pizza sauce between the cups, then top with onion and mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide the pizza sauce between the cups, then top with onion and mushrooms.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with cheese then with pepperoni.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with cheese then with pepperoni.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bread is golden on the edges.
